1.name: The Cihuateteo
1.description: A female spirit warrior who died of childbirth.

2.name: Centzon Totochtin
2.description: An aggressive mystical rabbit has appeared.

3.name: Big Axolotl
3.description: A pale dog sized amphibian with gills.

4.name: Giant Axolotl
4.description: A pale porsche sized amphibian with gills.

5.name: Yahui
5.description: A giant reptillian creature with a turtle shell on its back and flint claws

6.name: Ceuyatl
6.description: A big frog with a primitive stone knife.

7.name: Mega Axolotl
7.description: A bus sized amphibian with gills.

8.name: Ahuizotl
8.description: A dog shaped creature with a clawed hand on its tail.

9.name: Cipatli
9.description: A creature part crocodile, part fish, and part frog.
